content: uncle bernie s upcycled mittens by alice glass of three eye cat knits this pattern is inspired by the now-iconic mittens bernie sanders wore to president joe biden and vice president kamala harris s inauguration on january 20th 2021 they were gifted to him in 2016 by jen ellis a teacher in vermont @vtawesomeness on twitter you can email the original creator at jsellis21@gmail com but she is apparently not selling any mittens at this time bernie s inauguration day statement mitts were cut from upcycled sweaters this pattern obviously won t be an exact match but it s pretty darn close if you look closely at the mc section after the thumb separation there appears to be some decreases halfway up the mitts i believe the fabric for these was cut from the yoke of a sweater the original mittens also have a contrasting pattern on the reverse with an all-black palm i have chosen to repeat the brown pattern all around for simplicity this pattern is currently being tested and will be updated as needed notes/questions are best submitted via ravelry or instagram i am pushing this current update without yardages because i want the updated chart available asap sizing note the three sizes in this pattern are created solely by changing needle size keep your floats loose and mind your gauge by alice glass of three eye cat knits sizing child l/adult s adult m adult l measurement around palm 6 7 8 mitten length 8 5 11 12 5 materials yarn worsted weight __ __ __ yards mc medium brown ___ yards cc1 white/natural ___ yards cc2 beige/tan ___ yards cc3 dark brown ___ yards needles child l/adult s us size 3 3 25mm and us size 4 3 5mm adult m us size 5 3 75mm and us size 7 4 5mm adult l us size 7 4 5mm and us size 8 5 0mm gauge child l/adult s 4 5 stitches/5 5 row per inch adult m adult l notions waste yarn darning needle pattern with smaller needles and cc3 cast on 36 stitches join to work in the round being careful not to twist your work gusset thumb work 16 rounds of k1 p1 ribbing work chart a and chart b right hand on all stitches switch to mc and larger needles k9 m1 4x 40 stitches on row 23 put 13 stitches yellow line on chart on waste yarn begin working from chart then cast on 1 stitch with a backwards loop after last round graft together remaining stitches afterthought thumb repeat chart a 2x around for back and palm of hand go back to waste yarn put 13 stitches on needles and pick up 1 on round 16 work first 7 stitches first with waste yarn then in stitch from backwards loop cast on you may want to also pick pattern you will come back to this later for afterthought thumb up one stitch on either side of this one then
